   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to the License Plate Number Recognition project's documentation!
=========================================================================

This project serves to recognize License plate numbers of cars entering
the Automatic Parking lot near the new CPIT3 building. This is the documentation
to understand the operation of this code. Credits to `OpenAlpr <openalpr.com>`_
for the detection and recognition algorithms.


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 4
   :caption: Contents:

   license_motion_raw_capture_April2020
